edu.ie3.datamodel.io.connectors

Class SqlConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ie3.datamodel.io.connectors.SqlConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataConnector

    public class SqlConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataConnector
    Implements a DataConnector for a native SQL connection to a relational database. It was implemented with a PostgreSQL database in mind, so there might be dialect issues if used with other databases.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SqlConnector()
      Initializes a SqlConnector with default parameters:
      jdbcUrl = jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/simona
      username = postgres
      password = root
      SqlConnector(java.lang.String jdbcUrl, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Initializes a SqlConnector with the given JDBC url, username and password

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqlConnector

        public SqlConnector(java.lang.String jdbcUrl,
                    java.lang.String userName,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Initializes a SqlConnector with the given JDBC url, username and password
        Parameters:
        jdbcUrl - the JDBC url, should start with "jdbc:postgresql://" and contain the database name
        userName - Name of the role used for authentication
        password - Password for the role

      • SqlConnector

        public SqlConnector()
        Initializes a SqlConnector with default parameters:
        jdbcUrl = jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/simona
        username = postgres
        password = root

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.sql.Statement stmt,
                                       java.lang.String query)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executes the given query. For update queries please use executeUpdate(String).
        Parameters:
        stmt - the created statement
        query - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the query result
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the execution fails

      • executeUpdate

        public int executeUpdate(java.lang.String updateQuery)
        Executes an update query
        Parameters:
        updateQuery - the query to execute
        Returns:
        The number of updates or a negative number if the execution failed

                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Establishes and returns a database connection
        Returns:
        the connection object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the connection could not be establlished

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> extractFieldMaps(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
        Extracts all field to value maps from the ResultSet, one for each row

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extractFieldMap(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
        Extracts only the current row of the ResultSet into a field to value map
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the field map for the current row
